Instruction: Melt the ghee in a skillet over medium heat, then add the cumin, turmeric, coriander, salt, mustard seeds, and cayenne pepper. Add the potatoes to the skillet and stir to coat them evenly with the ghee. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring frequently. Pour in the water, reduce the heat to low, and let it simmer for 30 minutes until the potatoes are tender.
Garnish with chopped cilantro before serving.
